text:
If a tag file is defined in XML syntax , and if it refers to another tag file 
in normal syntax , an XML parse exception is thrown
===========================

creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
jan.luehe@sun.com
text:
JSP 2.0 does not define an XML syntax for tag files.
(It does define an XML *view* for tag files, though.)
